sentence.Network_en: If you ever cross him, forget it, you're finished.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你曾经和他作对过，就别想了，你没戏了。

sentence.Network_en: The priest made the sign of the cross over him.
sentence.Network_cn: 神父在他上方画了个十字。

sentence.Network_en: I've never seen him get cross or lose his temper.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从未见过他生气或者发火。
